div.p: This OID identifies the coding system published in the ISO 3166-1 Standard for Country codes. It contains 3 sets of synonyms for the country codes: 2-character alphabetic, 3-character alphabetic, and numeric. Note that this is the 2nd edition of the standard.

description.value: This OID identifies the coding system published in the ISO 3166-1 Standard for Country codes. It contains 3 sets of synonyms for the country codes: 2-character alphabetic, 3-character alphabetic, and numeric. Note that this is the 2nd edition of the standard.
